cards.name: Bishop of Rebirth
cards.text: Whenever Bishop of Rebirth attacks, you may return target creature card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

cards.name: Kopala, Warden of Waves
cards.text:
Spells your opponents cast that target a Merfolk you control cost {1} more to cast.

Abilities your opponents activate that target a Merfolk you control cost {1} more to activate.

cards.name: Walk the Plank
cards.text: Destroy target non-Merfolk creature.

cards.name: Unclaimed Territory
cards.text:
As Unclaimed Territory enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.

{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.

{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.  Spend this mana only to cast a creature spell of the chosen type.

cards.name: Burning Sun's Avatar
cards.text: When Burning Sun's Avatar enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to target opponent and 3 damage to up to one target creature.

cards.name: Old-Growth Dryads
cards.text: When Old-Growth Dryads enters the battlefield, each opponent may search his or her library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle his or her library.

cards.name: Ashes of the Abhorrent
cards.text: Players can't cast spells from graveyards or active abilities of cards in graveyards.\nWhenever a creature dies, you gain 1 life.

cards.name: Settle the Wreckage
cards.text: Exile all attacking creatures target player controls. That player may search his or her library for that many basic land cards, put those cards onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle his or her library.

cards.name: Priest of the Wandering Sun
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may reveal a Dinosaur card from your hand. If you do, gain 2 life.

{3}{W}{W}, Sacrifice Priest of the Wandering Sun: Search your library for a Dinosaur card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Sanguine Sacrament
cards.text: You gain twice X life. Put Sanguine Sacrament on the bottom of its owner's library.

cards.name: River's Rebuke
cards.text: Return all nonland permanents target player controls to that owner's hand.

cards.name: Vraska's Contempt
cards.text: Exile target creature or planeswalker. You gain 2 life.

cards.name: Deadeye Tracker
cards.text: {1}{B}, {T}: Exile two target cards from an opponent's graveyard. Deadeye Tracker explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back on top or into your graveyard.)

cards.name: Fathom Fleet Captain
cards.text:
Menace 

Whenever Fathom Fleet Captain attacks, if you control another attacking Pirate, you may pay 2. If you do, create a 2/2 black Pirate creature token with lifelink.

cards.name: Boneyard Parley
cards.text: Exile up to five target creature cards from graveyards. An opponent seperates those cards into two piles. Put all cards from the pile of your choice onto the battlefield under your control and the other into their owner's graveyards.

cards.name: Gishark, Sun's Avatar
cards.text:
Trample, vigilance, haste 

When Gishark, Sun's Avatar deals combat damage to a player, reveal that many cards from the top of your library. Put any number of Dinosaur creature cards from among them onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

cards.name: Tilomalli's Skinshifter
cards.text:
Haste

Whenever Tilomalli's Skinshifter attacks, it becomes a copy of another target nonlegendary attacking creature until end of turn.

cards.name: Tocaf's Honor Guard
cards.text: Creatures entering the battlefield don't cause abilities to trigger.

cards.name: Admiral Beckett Brass
cards.text:
Other Pirates you control get +1/+1. 

At the beginning of your end step, gain control of target nonland permanent controlled by a player who was dealt combat damage by three or more Pirates this turn.

cards.name: Sunbird's Invocation
cards.text: Whenever you cast a spell from your hand, reveal the top X cards of your library, where X is that spell's converted mana cost. You may cast a card revealed this way with converted mana cost X or less without paying its mana cost. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

cards.name: Mynea Frian, Dark Apostle
cards.text: Whenever one or more nontoken Vampires you control attack, create a 1/1 white Vampire creature token with lifelink.

cards.name: Star of Extinction
cards.text: Destroy target land. Star of Extinction deals 20 damage to each creature and each planeswalker.

cards.name: Aegriah's Marauders
cards.text: If a creature you control would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals double that damage to that permanent or player instead.

cards.name: Herald of Seven Servants
cards.text: Creatures you control with +1/+1 counters on them can't be blocked.

cards.name: Shaper's Sanctuary
cards.text: Whenever a creature you control becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, you may draw a card.

cards.name: Verdant Sun's Avatar
cards.text: Whenever Verdant Sun's Avatar or another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you gain life equal to that creature's toughness.

cards.name: Carnage Tyrant
cards.text:
Carnage Tyrant can't be countered. 

Trample, hexproof

cards.name: Waker of the Wilds
cards.text: {X}{G}{G}: Put X +1/+1 counters on target land you control. That land becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.

cards.name: Haven Raptor
cards.text: Tough - Whenever Haven Raptor is dealt damage, draw a card.

cards.name: ~Kimalla's Sunwing
cards.text:
Flying
Creatures your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.

cards.name: Emperor's Vanguard
cards.text: Whenever Emperor's Vanguard deals combat damage to a player, explore. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back on top or into your graveyard.)

cards.name: Evaporating Melody
cards.text: Gain control of target creature with converted mana cost X.

cards.name: Revel in Riches
cards.text:
Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, create a colorless Treasure artifact token with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool." 

At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control ten or more Treasures, you win the game.

cards.name: Tiehana, Voice of Thunder
cards.text: Tiehana, Voice of Thunder's power and toughness are equal to the number of cards in your hand.\nYou have no maximum hand size.\nWhen Tiehana enters the battlefield, draw a card for each creature you control.

cards.name: Ogre Fleet Ravager
cards.text:
Creature - Orc Pirate Wizard
Menace, deathtouch

When Ogre Fleet Ravager enters the battlefield, each player loses a third of his or her life, rounded up.

cards.name: Deeproot Champion
cards.text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Deeproot Champion.

cards.name: Dreamcaller Siren
cards.text:
Flash
Flying
Dreamcaller Siren can only block creatures with flying.
When Dreamcaller Siren enters the battlefield, if you control another Pirate, tap up to two target nonland permanents.

cards.name: Goring Ceratops
cards.text: Double strike\nWhenever Goring Ceratops attacks, other creatures you control gain double strike until end of turn.

cards.name: Hostage Taker
cards.text: When Hostage Taker enters the battlefield, exile target artifact or creature until Hostage Taker leaves the battlefield. You may cast that card for as long as it remains exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast that spell.

cards.name: Sunpetal Grove
cards.text:
Sunpetal Grove enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Forest or a Plains.
{T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool.

cards.name: Ruin Raider
cards.text: Raid - At the beginning of your end step, if you attacked with a creature this turn, reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. You lose life equal to that card's converted mana cost.

cards.name: Rootbound Crag
cards.text:
Rootbound Crag enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Mountain or a Forest.
{T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool.

cards.name: Rowdy Crew
cards.text: Trample\nWhen Rowdy Crew enters the battlefield, draw three cards, then discard 2 cards at random. If two cards that share a type are discarded this way, put two +1/+1 counters on Rowdy Crew.

cards.name: Glacial Fortress
cards.text:
Glacial Fortress enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Plains or an Island.
{T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool.

cards.name: Drowned Catacomb
cards.text:
Drowned Catacomb enters the battlefield tapped unless you control an Island or Swamp.
{T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool.

cards.name: Dragonskull Summit
cards.text:
Dragonskull Summit enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Swamp or Mountain.
{T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool.

cards.name: Bloodstained Paladin
cards.text: Flash\nBloodstained Paladin enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each creature that died this turn.

cards.name: Arcane Adaptation
cards.text: As Arcane Adaptation enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.\nCreatures you control are the chosen type in addition to their other types. The same is true for creature spells you control and creature cards you own that aren't on the battlefield.

cards.name: Captain Lannery Storm
cards.text:
Haste
Whenever Captain Lannery Storm attacks, create a colorless Treasure artifact token with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."
Whenever you sacrifice a Treasure, Captain Lannery Storm gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

cards.name: Daring Saboteur
cards.text:
{2}{U}: Daring Saboteur can't be blocked this turn.
Whenever Daring Saboteur deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

cards.name: Sorcerous Spyglass
cards.text: As Sorcerous Spyglass enters the battlefield, look at an opponent's hand, then choose any card name.\nActivated abilities of sources with the chosen name can't be activated unless they're mana abilities.

cards.name: Vanquisher's Banner
cards.text: As Vanquisher's Banner enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.\nCreatures you control of the chosen type get +1/+1.\nWhenever you cast a creature spell of the chosen type, draw a card.

cards.name: Ogre Hand Ravager
cards.text: When Ogre Hand Ravager enters the battlefield, each player loses a third of his or her life, rounded up.
